name: camper
example_en: The camper set up his tent near the lake.
example_cn: 露营者在湖边搭起了帐篷。
word_family: camp(n/v) 营地；露营 ,camping(n) 露营；野营 ,campground(n) 露营地；营地
memory_tips: 词根 'camp' 来自拉丁语 'campus'，意为'田野'或'营地'。联想记忆：想象一个露营者在野外搭帐篷的场景。图像记忆：画一个帐篷和露营者在篝火旁的情景。

image_prompt.main_image: A cozy tent set up in a green field near a serene lake, with a campfire burning nearby and a camper sitting on a log, enjoying the view.
image_prompt.example_image: A camper in a red jacket setting up a blue tent on a grassy area by a lake, with mountains in the background and a clear blue sky.

collocations: camper van (露营车); camper trailer (露营拖车); experienced camper (有经验的露营者)
